Description: For sale is a 2013 Gibson Les Paul Standard Gary Moore Signature Tribute in a beautiful Lemonburst with the original case. This guitar is in very good condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches, dings, and a little wear on the back. Overall, I would give it a solid 8.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case is in excellent condition and works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.67" 1st Fret: 0.84" 12th Fret: 0.95" Neck Type: Rounded 50's Finger Board: Granadillo Pickups: Burstbucker Rhythm/Lead Pro Weight: 8lb 12oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
